sweep up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to clean the dust, dirt etc from the floor or ground using a brush with a long handle
sweep up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The janitor was just sweeping up as I left the building.
Jan was sweeping up the bits of paper and broken glass.
sweep up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to pick someone up in one quick movement
sweep up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Harriet swept the child up in her arms and hugged her.
